snippet.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Speaks on Having an Affair With Amber Heard (Video)
snippet.description:
Leonardo DiCaprio Speaks on Having an Affair With Amber Heard (Video)
According to several media outlets, Leonardo promised to completely destroy Johnny Depp's career upon hearing the ongoing rumors. However, Johnny has maintained complete and total silence on the matter so far. In fact, only Amber Heard has publicly commented on the alleged affair between her and Leonardo Dicaprio. During her statements, Amber Heard also managed to speak up on other matters regarding their past marriage and the alleged behavior of Johnny Depp. The entire discussion only started after Amber brought the issue up herself in front of the media. She alleged that Johnny Depp had accused her of cheating on him with Leonardo DiCaprio. Her statements inferred that she and Leonardo were nothing more than co-workers, and Johnny Depp was the "bad guy" in the story.

Here on Film Streak we are all about the latest spill in Hollywood! You can rest assure that we will bring you all the latest celebrity drama and gossip especially concerning you favorite actors! We´ll also make sure to keep you updated on the newest movie updates and releases – so if you are interested in anything that happens in Hollywood, you should make sure to stay tuned!  

And there you have it guys! We hope you enjoyed the video! If you did please consider leaving a like and telling us what you though in the comments! 

Here are some links to some of our other videos that you might find interesting as well:
